name: Piano Teacher - Piano Lesson Ms Su

reviews.text: Starting piano at Grade 8 as a Malaysia transfer student was a challenge, but my teacher's patience and encouragement made it enjoyable. I've gained confidence quickly and developed a true love for music, all thanks to their amazing teaching!

Ms Su has been teaching me for about about 10 years already, ever since I was Primary 1. She has taught me until grade 6 in piano and is now teaching me some pop songs. She is a very kind and patient and will always provide helpful tips and ways to improve the way I am playing, even when teaching songs that she is not very familiar with. Her lessons are able to maintain my interest in playing the piano and I am very grateful for her teaching for the past 10 years.

Been my teacher for 14 whole years and taught me piano from scratch all the way to Grade 8 and beyond. Probably the person outside of my family that I've spent the most amount of time with. She is kind and patient, while still allowing her teaching to be direct and effective. Lessons often result in evident improvement, and she is able to adapt to your improvements accordingly in each lesson. Overall, a fantastic piano teacher, both short-term and long-term, able to teach people of all ages and skill levels, and an amazing person all around. 5 stars.

I have been learning piano from Ms Suriaty since 2011. She is a very dedicated, passionate and encouraging teacher who takes time to ensure that I learn well and understand the right way to play the piano. She guides me and prepares me well for my piano and theory exams. Even during the lockdown, she conducted lessons online and continued to find ways to ensure that I learn effectively so that learning is not disrupted. Throughout all these years, she continues to guide and motivate me. She is also very caring and patient and will take time to ask me how I’m doing. Every year, she gives me the opportunity to take part in a concert performance where I can invite my family to watch. I am grateful to have learnt so much from her and I really enjoy learning piano from her.

Have been taught by Ms Su since I was 10, always wanted someone who was patient and passionate about music as well. It's been 6 years and a wonderful journey, could not have asked for any better. Incrediby helpful lessons that will be sure to get you into piano and music in general. Thanks for all the help and support! ♥️
